args.name: cleaner
args.description: Filters and cleans up data for conversational formatting, where the user input is structured as a question and the output is the model's response.

inputs.name: df
inputs.description: A pandas DataFrame containing columns such as 'Entry', 'Organism', 'Length', 'Sequence', and other protein details.

outputs.description: A list containing conversationally formatted input and output for each protein sequence.

rows: FUNCTION: Serine endoprotease which cleaves substrates at the RX(K/R)R consensus motif. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:12855702}.

output.content: What information can you tell me about the protein sequence: 
This sequence Serine endoprotease which cleaves substrates at the RXR consensus motif. Secreted. Peptidase S8 family, Furin subfamily.
